verses.text: King Ahasuerus laid a tribute on the land and on the islands of the sea.

Aren’t all the acts of his power and of his might, and the full account
of the greatness of Mordecai, to which the king advanced him, written in the book of the chronicles of
the kings of Media and Persia?

For Mordecai the Jew was next to King Ahasuerus, and great amongst the
Jews and accepted by the multitude of his brothers, seeking the good of his people and speaking peace
to all his descendants.

text:
King Ahasuerus laid a tribute on the land and on the islands of the sea.
Aren’t all the acts of his power and of his might, and the full account
of the greatness of Mordecai, to which the king advanced him, written in the book of the chronicles of
the kings of Media and Persia?
For Mordecai the Jew was next to King Ahasuerus, and great amongst the
Jews and accepted by the multitude of his brothers, seeking the good of his people and speaking peace
to all his descendants.
